Specs

CSS Class: .x-panel

Ext.form.Panel

Extends from Ext.panel.Panel

  • Panel Header (.x-panel-header)

    • title

    • glyph

    • tools

  • Panel Body (.x-panel-body)

  • (optional) Docked Toolbar (.x-toolbar)

    • waitTitle

    • buttons

    • height

    • width

    • margin

    • padding

    • bodyPadding
